results.deck: AlfaSystem Co.,Ltd. is a development and planning company from Kumamoto City, Japan. The company has been around since 1988.
results.description: AlfaSystem is a small company with only 59 employees. The company has made game for nearly every platform since 1988. The first game they developed was for the PC Engine and recently they have been developing for most major current generation hardware. The most notable games they developed for the Western market would be the Phantasy Star Portable series.
results.name: Alfa System
